effect.Name: Blend Phoenix (Background)
effect.description: The shader compares the minimum value with base and blend and subtracts the maximum value from it by also comparing base and blend and adds 1.0 at the end.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Blend Phoenix (Background) Shader | 1.0 (15.07.2024) */
parameter.description: The shader compares the minimum value with base and blend and subtracts the maximum value from it by also comparing base and blend and adds 1.0 at the end.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
